title: Cheap is very good
text:
We went to this place because our ticket was already included.
The place is very cool and there is still a lot of standing that we can see, including a church.
We enjoyed the visit very much and it is worthwhile to see the columns from different style.

title: Good food, good service
text: The restaurant is beautiful and with great service. They had a menu in several languages and the waiter was very friendly. It wasn't the best Greek food we ate on the trip, but a great restaurant.

title: souvenirs place
text:
This is not a place you necessarily have to go, but it is the best place to buy souvenirs.
Here you will find inexpensive souvenirs from 0.5 cents to expensive pots of more than 300 euros.

title: Huge
text:
The place is huge and you would spend hours looking.
Inside there is a very beautiful reconstructed museum and a temple that are very worthwhile, the rest are more ruins and you can't see what was there

title: Little thing standing, but worth it
text:
The temple is huge and has little standing, but it was worth the walk. I really enjoyed seeing the place and seeing everything up close.
When you buy the ticket for acropolis you have a 30 euros option with more temples and this is included in this ticket. Separately it cost about 8 euros.

title: Show!
text: The temple has undergone a recent renovation and is well maintained and we can see a lot of it. He is small compared to the others around, but I found it beautiful. Even a ticket to visit Acropolis is worth it.

title: Very beautiful
text: This point is inside Acropolis, so the same ticket is ok. The place is very beautiful and you can get a sense of what the theater plays were like at that time. I loved it.

title: Fantastic
text:
The place is beautiful and fantastic. Everyone who visits Athens should spend some time here.
The ticket was 20 euros per person, but it was worth every penny.

title: Old Quarter
text: A place you should spend at least 30 minutes getting to know. The neighborhood looks like those from very old movies and with small houses and straight on the street. Alleys like streets and great restaurants.

title: Great
text:
The place is really nice. You need to spend at least 2 hours there to see everything. A big place with a lot of small temples and things to see.
If you stay in Athens you can't miss this place. The entrance was 20 euros by person, mas it was really good payed.
